name: Dickies Big Men's Short Sleeve Twill Work Shirt
categoryPath: Clothing/Big & Tall/Big & Tall Tops & T-Shirts/Big & Tall Woven Shirts

reviews.name: Dickies Big Men's Short Sleeve Twill Work Shirt
reviews.title: nice shirts

reviews.name: Dickies Big Men's Short Sleeve Twill Work Shirt
reviews.reviewText: I bought these shirts 7 years ago for my husband who work in construction. I have to say they have outlasted any other pieces of clothing he has worn including his off work clothes. I am just now replacing them but not because they are wore out but because 7 years of washing has finally faded them a little. He would never wear another workshirt.
reviews.title: Very durable

reviews.name: Dickies Big Men's Short Sleeve Twill Work Shirt
reviews.reviewText:
great work shirts and nice looking too..
these shirts have held up very well for me,I've recommended these to several coworkers and they have all been impressed with them..
sizing seems to run pretty true
reviews.title: excellent value on a great shirt

reviews.name: Dickies Big Men's Short Sleeve Twill Work Shirt
reviews.reviewText: I don't like to pay a lot for casual shirts and most of the low price shirts are junk. I decided to try some work shirts that had a stylish look. This Dickies brick red shirt was just what I was looking for. A nice heavy material that looks good after drying it on the line. I expect it to last for years. Very happy with the purchase!
reviews.title: A great shirt and a great price.

reviews.name: Dickies Big Men's Short Sleeve Twill Work Shirt
reviews.reviewText: This is the second time I have purchased these for my husband. He is a mechanical engineer who often has to work on the factory floor. He always comes home filthy, and his clothes really take a beating, but these stand up to it! I purchased the first set at least 10 months ago and they are still in pretty good shape. I was so satisfied I am not even considering trying different brands. They are also available in a variety of colors and with long sleeves.
reviews.title: The perfect work shirt
